rules.text: Be respectful of one another
If someone asks you to stop, STOP. Ignoring such a request, especially from a mod, will result at minimum in a timeout.
If there is an issue, use the reporting tools so moderators and admins can handle it.

No bigotry or harassment. grandma.space has a ZERO TOLERANCE policy for the instigation or perpetuation of hateful speech and ideology, disrespect of its members or staff, incendiary behavior, or other such inappropriate conduct.
Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use nsfw tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.
Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning.
Zero tolerance for illegal content. You will be reported to law enforcement.
Zero tolerance for hate speech.
Zero tolerance for posts inciting violence.
Zero tolerance for posts encouraging self-harm.
Be kind to one another.
Impersonation not clearly marked as parody is not allowed and will be hushed.

instance.title: Tweet Rex
instance.shortDescription: Great to meet new people, toot, and have some fun.
instance.description: Tweet Rex is a free and open social networking tool. Our only purpose if for people to communicate freely and have some fun. Common Sense Rules The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of tweettex.xo.uk; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies: The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline: - Excessive advertising - Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources - Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions - Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: - Racism or advocation of racism - Sexism or advocation of sexism - Casteism or advocation of casteism - Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof - Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service: - Sexual depictions of children Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors: - Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that hasspecifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. -Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. - Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law. Cross-posting "Cross-posting" is the automatic copying of posts from one platform to another. That definition does not include the simultaneous posting to multiple platforms from the same app, such as Twidere or PostyBirb. If you use those apps, we consider those posts original, and the following need not apply. Cross-posting from Mastodon to other platforms is fully permitted.Cross-posting into Mastodon from another platform is permitted under the following terms: - The posts do not include platform-specific references, e.g. talking about "here" meaning Twitter, or including text from other non-Mastodon users verbatim (e.g. cross-posted quote tweets) - The account is at least semi-regularly monitored by the author, so that interactions from Mastodon users are not ignored - The account being cross-posted is owned by the same person. Third-party copying of content is not permitted

rules.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin@stellar.build
Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.
Do not tone police. Even if someone else violates the CoC, it is not your responsibility to moderate them or criticize them for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them.

The only rule is: NOTHING ILLEGAL ALLOWED.
Be happy!

instance.title: Mastodon
instance.shortDescription: Esta es una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, explícitas e implícitas.
instance.description: Esta es una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, explícitas e implícitas.

contactAccount.note: Administro Paquita, una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, explícitas e implícitas.

fields.name: Donaciones
fields.value: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=82580186

rules.text: Respeta la identidad propia, las experiencias y la personalidad de los demás. Todos los tipos de personalidad son bienvenidos aquí, siempre que respeten y no dañen a los demás. Al mismo tiempo, ten en cuenta que los demás pueden cometer errores o utilizar una terminología diferente a la tuya.

Racismo, machismo, capacitismo, homofobia, transfobia, queerfobia, xenofobia, antisemitismo, islamofobia y supremacismo blanco suponen bloqueo inmediato y, en caso de que los administradores consideren que esta conducta puede ser delictiva, una denuncia inmediata a las autoridades.

Se bloqueará inmediatamente a toda persona o dominio que implícita o explícitamente difunda retórica fascista, nazi, franquista, de extrema derecha y otras formas de nacionalismo violento o excluyente. En caso de detectar un posible delito de odio los administradores contactarán con las autoridades.

Se bloqueará a toda cuenta o dominio que comparta enlaces o material multimedia violento o que promueva la violencia. Los administradores se reservan el derecho a informar a las autoridades en caso de que encuentren indicios de actividad delictiva.

Queda prohibido el acoso a usuarios, usuarias y usuaries en todas sus formas, incluyendo el acoso sexual, sealioning, flaming, doxxing, bullying, joseo, subtooting, outing o suplantación de identidad entre otras formas de acoso.

Se bloqueará a toda cuenta o dominio que promueva conductas lesivas para la salud como el consumo y distribución de drogas, los trastornos de alimentación, las autolesiones, el suicidio, la ludopatía y la apología de conductas dañinas para la salud física y mental de la persona en general.

Queda terminantemente prohibida la distribución de textos, enlaces o material multimedia donde se incluya o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores, reales o figurados. Los administradores de Paquita podrán contactar con las autoridades en caso de que detecten posible actividad delictiva.

Paquita es una instancia libre de pornografía. No se permite a usuarios, usuarias o usuaries, trabajadores sexuales o no, que distribuyan repetidamente enlaces o material multimedia donde se muestre actividad sexual o fluidos corporales, aunque se haga catalogando el material como sensible y #NSFW.

Compartir material multimedia o enlaces sobre desnudez está permitido, siempre que sean desnudos propios de la persona que sube el material, sin involucrar a terceros, y que se catalogue como material sensible y se incluya advertencia o CW sobre este contenido, con las etiquetas #NSFW y #Nudity.

Se puede compartir ocasionalmente el propio trabajo o el de otras personas, pero no está permitido el marketing agresivo, el spam o publicitar productos y servicios si se recibe un pago o recompensa sustancial por ello.
Se considera recompensa sustancial cualquier regalo al usuario por un valor superior a 20€. El beneficio propio por compartir cualquier enlace promocional ha de ser debidamente advertido.
Se bloqueará a usuarios y dominios que compartan repetidamente bulos (especialmente bulos políticos, científicos o sanitarios) o teorías conspirativas tales como la Teoría del Reemplazo.

Queda terminantemente prohibido promocionar o distribuir contenidos relacionados con las criptomonedas, esquemas Ponzi o de economía piramidal, juegos de azar, apuestas de cualquier tipo, loot boxes o consejos de trading tanto en mercados regulados como no regulados.
Se prohíbe la difusión de material multimedia o enlaces que muestren a personas en estado de embriaguez o bajo el efecto del abuso de drogas, tanto legales como ilegales.

Podrá mostrarse material audiovisual de alcohol y tabaco siempre con content warning y en un contexto de moderación. Se prohíben los enlaces para comprar o promocionar alcohol o tabaco en cualquier circunstancia.

Queda prohibida la difusión o promoción de textos, enlaces o material audiovisual acerca de las llamadas “bebidas energéticas” con alto contenido en cafeína, cuyo marketing está dirigido específicamente a menores, especialmente vulnerables.
Está terminantemente prohibida la difusión de material audiovisual o enlaces que muestren drogas ilegales o de venta muy restringida, como la marihuana.

Se prohíbe aconsejar la toma de cualquier medicamento, requiera este o no prescripción médica. Si una persona solicita consejo médico y alguien habilitado para ello quiere dárselo, deberá ser estrictamente en privado.

En Paquita se interpretará la insistencia en dar consejos sobre dieta, estilo de vida y salud a una persona que no los ha solicitado como una forma de acoso. Intentar avergonzar a una persona por su cuerpo o aspecto físico supone expulsión inmediata.

La legislación aplicable en la instancia Paquita es la del estado de España. Asimismo, no se permitirá ningún contenido ilegal en Alemania. Paquita se adhiere activamente a los principios de la Declaración Universal de los Derechos Humanos y la Convención de Derechos del Niño.

En semejanza al concepto jurídico de "buena fe", Paquita espera que sus usuarios se atendrán en todo momento al espíritu de la normativa aquí esbozada y no intentarán aprovechar detalles formales de la redacción de las normas en su beneficio.

instance.title: Mastodon
instance.shortDescription: This is the monogram.org Mastadon server. monogram.org started in 1999 as a community of likeminded people interested in open discourse about technology, arts, culture, and a better world. The domain monogram.org is inspired by Robert Rauschenberg's Combine Monogram. We got inspired, around 1994, by Monogram through the documentary series "The Shock of the New" where Robert Hughes discusses pop art and its influences on modern culture. The community around monogram.org has continued a sort of Flex Seminar through online forums and other activities over the years.

Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen (sog. Fake-News) und Verschwörungsmythen sind hier unerwünscht.

Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze.

rules.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).

Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux. Cela concerne aussi toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés).

instance.title: Mastodon Uno Social - Italia
instance.shortDescription:
Mastodon.Uno è la prima comunità generalista italiana del social Mastodon.
Con oltre 60.000 iscritti è il più grande nodo Mastodon italiano.
instance.description:
Mastodon.uno è il social network generalista Italiano parte della più grande rete internazionale di social interconnessi liberi ed open source: Il Fediverso, un neologismo composto dall'unione di due parole "federazione" e "universo". È un nome comune per i social network federati che funzionano con software libero aperto su più di 6000 server in tutto il mondo e che al momento supera i 4 milioni di iscritti. Storicamente, questo termine ha incluso solo le piattaforme di microblogging che supportavano un insieme di protocolli chiamati OStatus. Con la comparsa e l'ampia adozione di un nuovo protocollo standard chiamato ActivityPub si è creata un grande numero di nuovi progetti liberi che intendono dare un'alternativa ai social commerciali. I social network del Fediverso sono molto differenti rispetto alle piattaforme mainstream (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, ecc). In primo luogo, tutte le reti federate sono sviluppate da comunità di persone in tutto il mondo, indipendentemente da qualsiasi società o istituzione ufficiale. Questo significa che puoi partecipare allo sviluppo e alla crescita del Fediverse. Tutte le competenze sono preziose: diffondere la parola, invitare amici sono attività molto gradite. Un'altra differenza di questi social network dai silos aziendali è il principio della federazione. Le reti principali concentrano milioni di utenti sui loro server. Questo dà loro il pericoloso potere di controllare le informazioni e di accumulare i dati privati degli utenti, utilizzandoli a scopo di lucro commerciale (e chissà quali altr scopii). Le reti Fediverse sono progettate per essere gestite da chiunque: sei libero di scegliere e registrarti su qualsiasi server che ti piace, puoi scegliere la persona che si occuperà dei tuoi dati - l'amministratore del tuo server. Se hai una ottima conoscenza tecnica, puoi amministrare il tuo server per i tuoi amici e la tua famiglia, collegandoti a tuo piacimento con migliaia di altri server indipendenti attraverso il web. In un certo senso, Fediverse è un universo autonomo dove il potere e i dati sono decentralizzati e sparsi in più paesi, mentre i siti web aziendali tradizionali si sono fatti ciascuno un imperatore (o un tiranno?) del proprio enorme impero, circondati da alte recinzioni, e riservano a se stessi tutte le decisioni, il controllo dei dati e la censura. Mastodon.uno è interconnesso con tutte le reti federate ed è interoperabile con ognuna di loro fancente capo al "Fediverso" ed è la community italiana ad essere consigliata dal sito ufficiale di mastodon in quanto segue rigidi criteri di affidabilità fra cui: ci sono più di un responsabile tecnico disponibile 24h in caso di problemi, garazie nel mantenere il sito attivo online, moderazione attiva contro azioni discrimitorie e di odio. Mastodon.uno è inoltre una delle poche istanze in cui è attiva la ricerca sul testo, che è disattivata nella maggior parte delle istanze in quanto richiede un'enorme potenza di calcolo.

Mastodon non ti obbliga a iscriverti con il tuo nome e cognome o con il tuo numero di telefono, puoi mantenere la tua privacy ed utilizzare qualsiasi nome, abbiamo solo bisogno di una email per la verifica. Oppure al contrario se desideri avere un account con una identità vericata/verificabile basta inserire un piccolo script che trovi nel tuo pannello di modifica del profilo all'interno della home del tuo sito. Oppure utilizzando l'app open source keybase per verificare la propria identità su più social: keybase su mastodon.uno, keybase è una piattaforma con cui si può confermare che diversi profili social facciano capo a sé (per intenderci confermi gli account che gestisci), in modo sicuro utilizzando la crittografia. I social commerciali come facebook e twitter negli ultimi anni si sono distinti per la capacità di disseminare disinformazione, teorie cospirazioniste e con lo scandalo Cambridge Analytica, la manipolazione dell'opinione pubblica. Inoltre le fake news, gli haters, la profilatura e la vendita dei dati personali a scopi commerciali. Questi ed altri sono i fenomeni problematici emersi solo negli ultimi anni attorno e dentro ai social network commerciali, Facebook in primis.
Facebook, Twitter eGoogle esistono vendendo i tuoi dati a terzi inserzionisti per sovvenzionare i servizi che ricevi gratuitamente, ma questo è molto negativo per la privacy degli utenti, perché le aziende sono incentivate ad abusare il più possibile della tua privacy. L'alternativa è il modello di Mastodon... abbiamo una certa percentuale di utenti che donano ed è questo che ci sostiene.
I social come facebook e twitter devono rispondere ai loro azionisti e aumentarne i profitti, usano gli algoritmi per creare la bolla di filtraggio: una gabbia rassicurante all’interno della quale, grazie all’intervento dei dati profilati di ogni utente, vediamo quasi esclusivamente contenuti che confermano quelle che già sono le nostre credenze.

Lungi dal mantenere la promessa originaria del web, ovvero offrire agli utenti un’informazione libera e diversificata, Facebook e compagnia non farebbero che mostrarci quello che vogliamo vedere, tenendoci spesso al riparo da informazioni che potrebbero incrinare le nostre certezze e rendere la nostra esperienza sui social media meno confortevole, questo rendere sempre più piacevole il trascorrere il tempo nei social ha come effetto un aumentando della permanenza e la dipendenza da social.

Se è vero che i social hanno accorciato le distante e favorito lo scambio e la comunicazione a distanza, è altrettanto vero che il prezzo da pagare in termini di rinuncia alla privacy e controllo sociale è davvero troppo alto.

Simile a Twitter nelle funzionalità, le caratteristiche di Mastodon Italia sono profondamente e concettualmente molto diverse, al punto di farne una sorta di anti-Facebook. Anzitutto la tutela dell'anonimato, questione maggiormente critica se consideriamo la creatura di Mark Zuckerberg. Mastodon, invece, è pensato e sviluppato per non pubblicare né conservare alcun dato sensibile, a tutela della privacy degli utenti. In questo senso, dunque, non profila e non detiene alcun dato personali a scopi commerciali o politici, non utilizza pubblicità o script che potrebbero profilare gli utenti e venderli per scopi commerciali ma si mantiene con le donazioni su Patreon.
Il software Mastodon non monitora tutto quel genere di informazioni che invece vengono registrare da piattaforme sociali correlate come Twitter, Instagram o Facebook: non calcola chi secondo lui potrebbe diventar mio amico/a. Non registra i millisecondi su cui mi soffermo su un’immagine, gli errori di battitura, i like, il tasso di engagement o il tipo di relazione che intercorre tra me ed un altro utente, quale sia il mio lavoro, i luoghi che visito. Non geolocalizza la mia posizione. Come vedremo, Mastodon manco mi chiede come mi chiamo e non mi obbliga nemmanco a comunicargli tutti i numeri nella mia Rubrica. Inoltre, come vedremo, puoi far sì che non sia in grado di leggere quel che tu scrivi. Il software Mastodon, insomma, raccoglie giusto le informazioni tecniche necessarie a funzionare.
Mastodon non é legato a doppio filo al tuo telefono o ad una singola app, per cui puoi accederci attraverso una delle app per android e iphone gratuite e open source, ma anche se il telefono l’avessi perso o distrutto potrai utilizzarlo. In effetti si può benissimo usare Mastodon su PC Linux, Windows, Mac e su qualsiasi altro dispositivo via Browser senza mai dover dare il tuo numero di telefono.
Il software utilizzato dai server Mastodon é F.L.O.S.S. ossia aperto, libero e verificabile da chiunque. Qualsiasi persona capace di programmare può verificare ciò che il software Mastodon fa, esattamente come un meccanico che può aprire un cofano, vedere il motore, trovarne i difetti, metterci le mani e migliorarlo
Mastodon, inoltre, viene gestito in modo collettivo, senza un vero e proprio padrone, ogni contenuto inserito rimane di proprietà dell'utente, può essere esportato e salvato per intero e utilizzato per altre piattaforme compatibili, in questo modo non si perderanno mai i contatti e i contenuti creati.
Mastodon.uno è autogestito ed autofinanziato, non è una società che cerca di creare profitto dalla tua vita e dai tuoi contenuti. Il tuo supporto via Patreon o Liberapay è fondamentale per mantenere questo servizio attivo ed efficiente.





Puoi seguire Mastodon.uno sui profili ufficiali:
Matrix> NoBlogo>
Mastodon>
Peertube>
Twitter>
Pixelfed>.

instance.title: Mastodon Transit Authority
instance.shortDescription: We are organizers, transit riders, renters, union members, tech workers, musicians, climate activists; we are passionate about mobility justice, a right to housing, and intersectional communities.
instance.description:
ridetrans.it is a transit-themed (with perhaps a visual theme to match someday!) server operated in Seattle by a group of local bus enthusiasts. We believe that cities are for people, housing is a need, and transit is the best.

Our admin group includes folks with multiply marginalized identities and we hope you let us know what you need to feel more welcome here.

You should ideally know someone who is already on the server or someone who knows someone who is. But if you also just like trains and buses, put that in your sign-up message and you'll likely be let through!

You only have about 400 characters (we will maybe change this in the future)

rules.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe.Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Kontaktiere keine Nutzer:innen die angegeben haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Nochmal ganz deutlich: Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus!
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Dazu gehören auch Witze und Kommentare.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Keine Killerphrasen, Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus
Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen nicht zuerst in öffentlichen Toots
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Verharmlosende oder gutheißende Inhalte zu Weißer Vorherrschaft, Antisemitismus, Transphobie oder anderen hasserfüllten Ideologien werden nicht geduldet.
Halte dich an die in Österreich geltenden Gesetze (verbietet u.a. auch gewaltverherrlichende Inhalte).
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen für Posts und NSFW-Marker bei Medien im Falle von kontroversen, aufrührerischen oder triggernden Themen
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht

instance.description:
Dragon Style

a Mastodon instance for dragons, and people who like dragons.

What's Mastodon? Mastodon is basically Twitter, except with less trolls and Nazis. And longer tweets.

It’s also Twitter without a whole bunch of VC investment that it needs to try and pay back by monetizing your eyeballs and keeping you on the site for as long as possible, regardless of whether that's by making you happy or enraging you.

And finally, the last big difference is that instead of living on a bunch of computers run by people working for Twitter, Mastodon lives on a bunch of computers run by whoever feels like running an “instance”.

Each instance can set its own policies. If you really want to be a jerk to people, you can find or start an instance that’ll let you! But people on other instances can very easily filter out not just you, but your entire instance. The hope is that this will keep things more civil than what Twitter has turned into. The reality is that there are probably exciting new failure modes somewhere in the future.

The policies of this particular instance can be found here. The TL;DR version of is "Imagine you have a cool queer aunt. Don't do anything that'd probably piss her off."

rules.text:
No discrimination against marginalized groups, based on:
ethnicity, gender identity or expression, sexual identity or expression, physical characteristics or age, disability or illness, nationality, residency, citizen status, wealth or education, religious affiliation, agnosticism or atheism
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Estonia/Europe will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

English preferred. Minecraft is a global community and English is the language that enables the most members to communicate with one another. This also allows us to keep the instance safe and enjoyable.
The contents of this instance should remain primarily about Minecraft. This includes all Minecraft related games created by Mojang Studios.

rules.text: Content warnings required. Use common sense with Content Warnings(CWs). Tag nudity, politics, violence, and kink content. Tag anything lewd, or inappropriate for an office environment, generally considered stuff the average person wouldn't wish to see at work.
Don't abuse crossposting. Crossposters from other services must be CW'd and set as unlisted.
Use image descriptions as much as you can.
Harassment and abusive behaviors are not allowed. This includes harassing other instances because you disagree with their policies

We have a zero tolerance policy for racism, sexism, homophobia, promotion of right wing/nazi ideology, transphobia, ableism, animal abuse. We reserve the right to expand this list at moderator discretion for topics we may have missed.
Use mutes/blocks/filters where you can to solve disputes. We're not here to mediate personal disputes.
Admins are not interested in your data. As in, we're not here to snoop your stuff unless it's for the purpose of handling a report.

No advertising This means no accounts on behalf or brands, or accounts representing organizations and/or for the purpose of advertisement allowed. Exceptions: personal accounts promoting artistic services like commissions.

You must be at least 18 years of age to register. Although we aren't an adult-oriented instance, we do federate with instances which are, and we cannot guarantee the timeline to be suitable for minors.
Meta discussions should be CW'd and set to unlisted.

Do not engage in unsolicited mentions-bombing/blowing up someone's mentions. Ie, rapidly replying to another user at a fast rate, posting many/excessive replies in rapid succession, especially unsolicited, in which the receiver has no chance to reply or process the post before another comes through.

instance.title: Mastodon - Augsburg.social
instance.shortDescription: Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg in's Fediverse finden kannst. Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.
instance.description:
Augsburg.Social im Fediverse


Hier ist alles kostenlos und ohne Werbung! Hier stecken keine Konzerne dahinter die sich an Deinen Daten bereichern wollen!

Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg in's Fediverse finden kannst.
Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.

Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfacher gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollständige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer Löschung von Toots und zu einer Blockierung von Accounts führen können, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:

Belästigung, Stalking, Doxxing
Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Befürwortung
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Befürwortung
Gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder übermäßige Werbung
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Alle Nachrichten die über diesen Dienst verschickt werden, dürfen weder gegen geltendes deutsches noch internationales Recht verstoßen.
Dieser Dienst dient nicht zur Verbreitung von Inhalten, Dateien und/oder Angeboten, die gegen deutsches und/oder internationales Recht verstoßen.
Das Versenden von Werbung oder gleich welcher Art über diesen Dienst ist untersagt.
Die Verbreitung und/oder Unterstützung rassistischer, sexistischer, nationalsozialistischer, antidemokratischer, unmenschlicher, homophober oder extremistischer Inhalte sind untersagt.
Verstöße gegen die Nutzungsbedingungen führen zum Ausschluss (Löschung des Kontos).

Bitte melde Verhalten, das dich stört an admin@augsburg.social. Das schließt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit anderen Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social, verfügbar in deren Github-Repository.

Augsburg.Social wird rein privat in der Freizeit betrieben.
Wir erwirken keinerlei Einnahmen und Gewinn mit dem Angebot und finanzieren es aus eigener Hand.
Dadurch behalten wir uns natürlich vor die angebotenen Dienste jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen Gründen einzuschränken oder zur Not ganz abzuschalten.
Wir werden uns jedoch bemühen Euch frühzeitig zu informieren falls soetwas eintreten sollte.

Falls ihr Fragen oder Probleme habt wendet Euch gern direkt auf Mastodon an @AnID@augsburg.social oder per E-Mail an admin@augsburg.social


Der Betrieb kostet viel Geld und Zeit. Strom und Hardwarekosten sind nicht gerade wenig... Wenn Ihr mich und diesen Dienst unterstützen wollt dann könnt Ihr sehr gerne etwas spenden um beizutragen, dass dieser Dienst auch noch lange online bleibt.

contactAccount.note:
Electrical engineer ┃ Nerd ┃ Let me, I can do it ┃ Love plants and animals ┃ Father and husband ┃ Admin of augsburg.social ┃ You never stop learning ┃ Unique is much better than perfet ┃ I think more than I say ┃ Mostly I don't mean it badly ┃ I am decent, the BKA does not have to send me Trojans

#Technik #Engineering #Linux #nobot

rules.text: Auf dieser Instanz sind alle Nutzenden willkommen, egal welcher politischen, religiösen oder sexuellen Ausrichtung und geschlechtlicher Identität.
Geht freundlich und respektvoll miteinander um. Auch wenn ihr andere Meinung seid.

Verboten ist die Verbreitung und Unterstützung gewaltverherrlichender, pornographischer,  rassistischer, sexistischer, nationalsozialistischer, faschistischer, antidemokratischer, rechtspopulistischer, inhumaner, fremdenfeindlicher, homophober, transphober oder extremistischer Inhalte.
Verboten ist die Verletzung von Persönlichkeitsrechten ebenso wie Doxing.

Verzichtet aus Rücksicht auf andere Nutzerinnen und Nutzer auf Bilder mit Blut oder anderen Körperflüssigkeiten oder nackten Menschen. Wenn es wirklich wichtig ist, setzt wenigstens eine aussagekräftige Content Warning (CW).
Wenn jemand beleidigend, diskriminierend oder schlicht nervtötend wird, kann dieser Account auch ohne Ankündigung sanktioniert oder deaktiviert werden.

Datenschutz fängt bei dir an. Poste nichts aus deiner tiefsten Privat- und -Intimsphäre - auch nicht als Direktnachricht - und hinterlege keine sensiblen Daten. Das ist weder eine Hochsicherheits-Software noch ein zwölffach verschlüsselter Server.
Keine exzessive Werbung.
Auf wue.social bist Du für deine eigenen Inhalte verantwortlich. Missbrauch kannst du mit den Reporting-Tools dieser Instanz melden.

fields.name: Website
fields.value: https://mastodon-belgium.be

rules.text:
Be nice to each other. No shitposting on this server.
Trolls will not be tolerated. Please act in a civilized manner.
No porn, explicit or violent media, racism, sexism, fascism, homophobia, or any other form of abusive behavior, harassment or hate speech.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No doxxing of users. Any form of harassment will not be tolerated.
No content illegal in Belgium or, by extension, EU law.

No intentional spreading of fake news, false information or misleading content.
This includes attempts to impersonate Mastodon staff.
No spam or advertising.

Politics and religion is tolerated but discouraged. Please use a Content Warning if you do post them.
Whatever your political or religious view may be is your concern but we'd appreciate it if you wouldn't use this platform to plaster it in other people's faces.

Please don't bring discussions from other Social Media channels over to Mastodon.
If you want to discuss a topic, please do it on the originating side.

If you're a commercial or government entity or you represent one, please consider hosting your own Mastodon instance.
This instance is set up and paid for by volunteers in order to give users access to the Fediverse.
It's not intended to be used as a commercial or governmental platform.

This is a private Mastodon instance, access to this server is a privilege and not a right.
The right to access and/or use this server may be revoked at any given time.

Interpretation of these rules is up to the server's admin discretion and is not open for discussion.
They may change without prior notice.

rules.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

instance.title: social.yesterweb.org
instance.shortDescription: The Yesterweb is a community which acknowledges that today's internet is lacking in creativity, self-expression, and good digital social infrastructure and wants to change that.
instance.description:
This community didn't emerge from within the tech industry, but from outside of it. It is driven by everyday users of the internet, regular people with diverse skills and interests who care about online spaces.

We acknowledge that the internet is made up of human beings. Conversing online doesn't make this any different. Behind every username is a real person with their own perspective and experiences.

We do not tolerate hate speech including sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia, chauvinism, and national/religious discrimination. We can do better.

It's not just about nostalgia or retro aesthetics but these interests signify that there is a need for change. Our goal is to forge a new path forward, toward building and cultivating a better internet.

rules.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe. Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Kontaktiere keine Nutzer:innen die angegeben haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Nochmal ganz deutlich: Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus!
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Dazu gehören auch Witze und Kommentare.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Keine Killerphrasen, Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus
Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen nicht zuerst in öffentlichen Toots
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Verharmlosende oder gutheißende Inhalte zu Weißer Vorherrschaft, Antisemitismus, Transphobie oder anderen hasserfüllten Ideologien werden nicht geduldet.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze (verbietet u.a. auch gewaltverherrlichende Inhalte).
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen für Posts und NSFW-Marker bei Medien im Falle von kontroversen, aufrührerischen oder triggernden Themen
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht

instance.title: Mastogram
instance.shortDescription: Music, Photography, Cars and Travel blogs.
instance.description:
Hello stranger.
It has occurred to me that one of the crucial elements of the early internet was the feeling that there was somebody out there, _somewhere_ on the globe, that was actually responding to that particular thing you were putting out there. It was a special feeling, because it was a sense of connection. Just being online and being part of the few select communities that existed back then was a commitment, and I believe that's in part what made it feel special.

With all the world gaining access to the internet, I think we've gained a lot, but lost this sense of wonder: Since online interactions have now become commonplace to the point of para-social meaninglessness, any single post or message doesn't really feel all that _real_.

Mastodon is still the closest thing I know to that primordial kind of internet, and so I'm putting this server out there. It might get forgotten and buried by Internet noise instantly, or it might survive, and on the off chance that it does and you find it:

I encourage you to use it to post here about whatever you're passionate about at the moment, however niche it might be. It might let you find some likeminded people and maybe recapture a bit of the best aspects of the internet in those early days.

In any case, I sincerely wish you a great day, from one surprisingly-real-but-currently-text-based being to another :)

PS:  No politics. 
PPS: Follow Oma.

contactAccount.note: The massive radiation exposure had failed to give him superpowers.

rules.text:
Discrimination & Bigotry Won’t Be Tolerated.

We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.

Respect Other Users.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

instance.title: Aspie Chattr
instance.shortDescription: A federated social network for aspies and other NDs to be themselves. Connect to the fediverse to benefit from a whole network of niche sites and follow people who share your interests.
instance.description:
Aspie Chattr is, above all else, somewhere to be yourself.

A federated social network for aspies and other NDs where you can chat to other peeps with ASD, ADHD, and related conditions. Discuss similar life experiences and your special interests or hyperfixations. Take your (metaphorical) mask off for a bit. You don't have to worry about "being normal" here!

Optionally, choose to see posts from the "fediverse" to bring in content from a whole network of niche sites, find ones related to your interests, and talk to other people who share them. Check out this post for how this works.

Privacy is a core value of the "fediverse" and we are no exception. We provide very flexible privacy controls for your content with no ads and no tracking. By default your posts are public but are not indexed by search engines. If you'd rather make your feed private and only allow those you approve to follow you, it's very easy. If you are happy to just float around the "fediverse" and share your thoughts across many different communities, you can do that too!

There is zero obligation to use a real name or post your face and your information isn't collected and sold to the highest bidder.

contactAccount.note: Welcome to the neurodiverse fediverse! Come along and say hi! #ActuallyAutistic #AspieChattr

rules.text: No trolling or harassment of anyone on this platform or others connected through federation.
No discrimination based on any protected characteristic of anyone on this platform or others connected through federation.

No personal attacks against other users of this platform or others linked through federation. It is perfectly acceptable for users to disagree with each other sometimes. You can either ignore it or debate the issue at hand. But in a rational debate you attack the idea, not the individual.
No releasing personal information on anyone, member of this site or not, against their will aka doxxing.
No spamming advertising of any kind, even if the links are autism related. No, we don't want your referral links for cheaply made fidget spinners.
No posting of nsfw content without using a nsfw tag on the post in question.
No conducting illicit activity using this platform and/or via federation.
No creating new accounts to circumvent bans. Alt accounts are permitted if you prefer to separate your activities and personas so long as you stay within the rules on all accounts.

rules.text: Racism, homophobia, antisemitism, transphobia, classism against the working class, ableism, exclusionary behavior, misogyny, genocide denial, harassment, Islamophobia, and other similar hate is not permitted. I will personally blast you into the sun.
Use content warnings for various topics, such as sexual content, mental health, food, and other touchy topics at your own discretion. If a content warning is required, the admins will let you know.
Don't advertise or spam. Asking for money is alright, but this is not a space to solely sell a product without somehow being tied to a user.

Illegal content is not allowed. Despite the knowledge that some laws are unjust, types.pl does not endorse illegal action. This specifically lies under the jurisdiction of the United States, as that is where the servers are located.
If you are using a Twitter crossposter, you should be posting content on Mastodon as well. If the large majority of your posts are Twitter crossposts, you will be banned.
Administrators reserve the right to defederate with instances or boot users off the instance at their will for any reason.

rules.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, transfeindliche, ableistische, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

rules.text: "Be excellent to each other" ist leichter gesagt als getan und bedeutet verschiedene Dinge für verschiedene Menschen.
Wir tolerieren keine Belästigung, Stalking und Doxxing.
Wir tolerieren keinen Rassismus, Sexismus, verbalen Missbrauch, Diskriminierung von Geschlecht und sexuellen Minderheiten oder die Förderung einer dieser Gruppen.
Wir tolerieren keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine nationalsozialistische Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Kontaktieren Sie keine Personen, die deutlich gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dazu gehört auch Dogpiling / Brigading.
Beiträge mit sexuellem Inhalt oder Gore müssen markiert werden.
Werbung muss markiert werden und darf nicht übertrieben oder automatisiert sein.
Bots dürfen nur dann mit einem Benutzer interagieren, wenn er von diesem dazu aufgefordert wird.
Wenn Sie mit einer hohen Frequenz posten müssen, stellen Sie bitte Ihre Beiträge auf nicht aufgelistet ein, um die lokale Zeitleiste lesbar zu halten.

rules.text: Please don't post anything that's illegal in the US or EU.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or any other form of discrimination.

Punch Nazis, trebuchet TERFs. Any posts or usage containing nazi symbolism or ideology, or which contains "gender critical" / "just asking questions" shit will get you banned immediately and without recourse.
No promotion of crypto or NFTs.
NSFW content must be behind a content warning / marked as sensitive. Your profile (avatar, header, display name, etc.) must be SFW.
Don't abuse the instance or use it to abuse other federated instances. Don't try to break things.

Be considerate. Keep in mind that any public post you make will appear in our public timeline and the public timelines of other instances federated with Urbanists.Social. Use content warnings where appropriate. Use NSWF tags where appropriate. Don't be a jerk about it.
Bots are allowed, but don't make them annoying. Admins will ask you to move your bot to another instance if it becomes a problem.
Do not harass other users.

rules.text: This is a safe and welcoming community. Abusive or antisocial behaviour will not be tolerated.
In particular, no hate speech or bigotry, including dogwhistles (implicit but deliberate discrimination through coded language).
No posting others' personal information or private exchanges without permission.
Do not continue to engage a person, or incite others to do so, after they have requested otherwise.
No content that is illegal in the United Kingdom, Germany, or France. This includes "grey area" content such as sexualized, artistic depictions of minors.
Sexual or sexually suggestive content must be tagged as such, with a clear content warning. Avatars and profile banners must be clean.

Same goes for artistic depictions of graphic violence or gore. Real pictures and recordings of gore and violence are generally not acceptable, you better have a really good reason. Shock value is not a good reason.
Bots are OK as long as they don't post to the public TL more than twice a day and don't interact with folks out of the blue. That means no followbots.
When in doubt about something you'd like to post, ask a mod. When in doubt about something you saw posted, report liberally.
We may take administrative action for reasons not listed here.

rules.text: Das Regelwerk gilt zu jederzeit und auf kompletten Mastodon Server.
Jegliche Bannumgehung (=Umgehen einer Strafe mittels zweiten/extra Account) ist verboten und wird mit einem sofortigen Ausschluss bestraft.
Illegale Inhalte, sowie (Kinder-)pornografische Inhalte sind verboten.
Es dürfen keine irreführende oder falsche Informationen geteilt oder veröffentlicht werden.
Die Meinungsfreiheit (Art 5 GG) ist gegeben, dennoch müssen alle Regeln hierbei eingehalten werden.
Das Team, von LGBTQPlus.social, behält sich das vor, jederzeit Inhalte zu löschen, wenn die Inhalte gegen die Regeln verstoßen.
Beleidigende, provozierende, homophobe, transfeindliche, nicht-jugendfreie, sowie rassistische Inhalte sind verboten.

rules.text:
Be good and kind to each other.
Give people's music a try.  You don't have to like it, but you also don't have to tell everyone you don't like it either.
Polite disagreements are fine but being rude will get you banned.
Invalidating someone else's music preferences, except for intolerant types of music (hate music etc) will earn a ban.
No advertisements except of musical bands or acts and related ads.  "My band is on tour" is fine.  "My cryptocurrency ad has music!" is not fine.
Links to illegal content are banned, especially music downloads you don't permission to distribute.
NSFW content without tagging will get you banned.
No spam.
If you're looking for Mastodon that rock / metal band, they're over at @mastodonmusic@mastodon.social (they're welcome to be here too but wow, epic namespace crossover).
No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion.
No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France and/or United States, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
No NFT content. None at all. There are crypto-related instances on the fediverse that would be more suitable.

Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).  Weird that this might happen on a music instance, but yet here we are...
Mastodon Music has a zero-tolerance mandate for harassment or bullying — your account will be immediately suspended.

No unapproved bots, advertising, or spam.  One big exception is direct posts by musicians about their music and concerts.  For now there's no rule on corporate posts, but if things get noisy and less-useful, we'll reword this to exclude excessive-profit-generating posts.

Prefer music purchase links over streaming links.  
(This isn't a hard and enforced rule, but musicians need everyone's support.  In other words, post Bandcamp or Store links at the top, and Spotify / YT Music links in the reply or comment whenever possible.)

rules.text: Discrimination, especially against minorities, is strongly discouraged. This includes, but is not limited to: Racism, xenophobia. Homophobia, transphobia, and other queerphobia. Classism. Gatekeeping the "queer" status (acephobia, etc.)
"Punching up" does not fall under the guideline above, and is allowed.

Usage of right-wing figures of speech are strongly discouraged. Please keep yourselves up-to-date on the dog whistles that are going around. Of course, this point will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis, as right-wing dog whistles are created to intentionally hijack everyday jokes and signs.

Advertising is strongly discouraged. Fund raisers, users of the site selling their own products or advertising their services are fine - we absolutely do not want corporations to advertise on here, however.

Posting media without media descriptions, also known as alt text, is strongly discouraged. We encourage you to enable the popups that warn you if you are about to toot or boost content that does not follow this guideline.
Don't spam. Of course, some jokes are mostly repetitive (common "fedi bits"), but use common sense on where to draw the line. If the local timeline contains just your toots, you're taking it too far.

Do not interpret these guidelines in bad faith, not even for "playing the devil's advocate". We are trying to foster a progressive community - if you have an issue with the guidelines, feel free to discuss it.

You must use content warnings for content. This includes obvious topics such as sexual content, assault, mental health issues, but also less obvious ones like food, selfies, pictures with eye contact to the viewer, etc. Even if you may not find topics triggering at all, this helps.
Any content illegal in Germany will be removed. We want this site to stay online, and as such, we have to follow laws in addition to our own morals.

instance.shortDescription: Privately hosted community of friends and open-source enthusiasts in Linz, Austria
instance.description: This is a private Mastodon server hosted with love by someone who left Twitter, Facebook and the other social networks behind to explore better ways of social interaction on the Internet. For now it's an experiment to discover how Mastodon works and if there is an interest for people to connect. Ideally it becomes a space for likeminded people to share and exchange ideas about a wide range of topics. This server has some rules, most importantly to 1) respect the law 2) respect one another and act like and adult. Furthermore, this server wants to allow a free exchange of ideas but within an ethical and moral scope that public social networks lack. This means that things like misinformation, conspiracy theories, climate change denial, racism, xenophobia, homo/trans/*phobia and all other forms of intolerance and ignorance are not tolerated by the admin.

instance.title: Senigallia.one
instance.shortDescription:
Mastodon è un social network non commerciale, federato e decentralizzato. Senigallia One è una istanza italiana offerta e gestita dal quotidiano online Vivere Senigallia.

Mastodon è una rete sociale federata. Ciò significa che nessuna singola entità controlla l'intera rete, piuttosto,come la posta elettronica, i volontari e le organizzazioni gestiscono i propri server indipendenti nei quali gli utenti possono interagire tra loro anche se registrati in server differenti. Senigallia.one fa parte della federazione mastodon e rispetta i principi cardine dei social decentralizzati: indipendenti, etici, liberi, gratuiti e autogestiti dalla propria community.

Mastodon è costruito come una versione più etica di Twitter e al momento è il più grande social network decentralizzato.

Benvenuti in una federazione di social dove gli inserzionisti non sono i padroni di casa.

Dove i vostri dati non sono confezionati e venduti.

Dove siete voi, non gli algoritmi, a decidere cosa vedere.

Dove puoi segnalare direttamente agli admin i contenuti ingannevoli.

Dove le azioni tossiche vengono tenute fuori.

Dove ti piace davvero passare il tempo.

Benvenuti sui social come dovrebbero essere.

Benvenuti su senigallia.one.

instance.shortDescription: Welcome to Typo.social! This is a Mastodon instance open to any typo and type enthusiastic. We are offering this service out of sheer courtesy without being held responsible for any disadvantages.
instance.description:
Welcome to Typo.social! This is a Mastodon instance open to type designers, typographers, letterers, fontworkers, calligraphers, tool builders, foundries, historians, scholars, students and enthusiasts. 
We are offering this service out of sheer courtesy without wanting to be held responsible for any disadvantages.

contactAccount.note: This is the official typo.social admin account.

rules.text: Please read and understand our terms of service: this includes a code of conduct.
This can be a home for type designers, typographers, letterers, fontworkers, calligraphers, tool builders, foundries, historians, scholars, students and enthusiasts.

Copyrights have deep and complex issues that do not all fit in this box. However, in general, please make sure you have permission to post the media you want include in your message. When practically possible, within reason, due diligence etc. Make sure all materials are properly credited.
Be kind. These are times of uncertainty and this instance is growing at unprecedented rates. So, please, be kind, and welcoming. Help others, when they ask questions.
Typo.social claims no copyright over media and text posted here.

Advertising: Typo.social is a discussion space, but we recognise that social media also functions as a commercial medium. We want our users to be able to advertise their products and services. Adds must be tagged using #advertisement. To further help users, discounts should also use #discount.

Advertorials: If you write posts or articles on behalf of a foundry or a distributor and only link to your customer’s products, this is clearly an advertorial. Therefor we kindly ask you to use the hashtag #advertorial. If your toot links directly into the shop, please use #advertising.

instance.description:
geislingen.NET ist ein soziales Netzwerk.
Es ist dezentral (so wie E-Mail!), werbefrei und soll ein Ort sein, an dem Menschen unterschiedlicher Herkunft und Art sich austauschen können.
Es basiert auf offenen Web-Protokollen und auf der freien, quelloffenen Software Mastodon.

Oberstes Gebot soll die gegenseitige Rücksichtnahme sein. Die Tatsache, dass dies ein öffentlicher Internetdienst ist und man sich nicht "real" gegenübersteht, entbindet nicht von den Grundregeln menschlichen Zusammenlebens und einem Mindestmaß an Benehmen.

Don't post anything designed to shock or disgust people.
This is not a NSFW server. I don't particularly care about the occasional not-quite-SFW post. I'm not puritan. But just don't make your account all about NSFW content. That's all!

Disagreement is fine, other opinions are welcome. Keep your discussion and disagreement civil and try to avoid ad hominems. If you venture into areas of denying other people's human rights, you'll find that you'll lose your rights to post here pretty darn quickly.
No threats of violence, etc.

I'll do my best to use a three-strike system and reach out regarding moderation decisions. But at the end of the day, this is not Elon's "public square". I don't owe you free speech. You can host your own Mastodon server if you want. I can, and will, make any moderation decision I feel is necessary.

instance.title: Mastodon
instance.shortDescription: 人生旅途 一路同行
instance.description:
谷歌市值一萬四千億美元； 臉書市值七千七百億美元；推特市值五百四十億美元。我有個問題：各位使用谷歌的搜索、臉書推特的帳號，從來是免費的，他們哪來這麼多錢？答案是：您各位就是商品。
現在，我建立了自己的去中心化社交平臺。我向大家募捐。同時，隨着用戶增多，我會向用戶收取小額費用，同時會有免費使用計劃。您免費用谷歌臉書推特，您依靠他們；您給我捐款、購買服務，我依靠您。我們在群裏聊天，好處是熱鬧，壞處是幾個人聊天，其他人就無法聊自己感興趣的話題。一個400人的群，如果其中總有390人在某一時刻無法發言，隨着這個群變大，大家就越來越不願說話，這個群就失去生機。留下來的是經常交談的幾個人，還有貼宣傳品的人。這個問題此刻已經被解決，就是我建立的Together 「一路同行」社交服務器。在這個服務器上，各位可以獲得類似twitter的體驗，每次發帖比twitter字數多，可以是500字符。同時，那裏不是400人，而是400萬人，您逐漸瞭解長毛象社區後，可以follow其他服務器上的人，他們也可以follow您。follow之後，他們的動態，就可以出現在您的federated （社區聯邦）時間線上；當然您也可以只看本地時間線。這樣可以兼顧小共同體內部的親密氣氛與瞭解外部世界。
------------------------

instance.title: Mastodon.IM
instance.shortDescription: 欢迎来到 Mastodon.im！这是一个泛话题中文实例。本站使用 Mastodon glitch-soc 分支运行，由 o3o.ca 运营。
instance.description: 欢迎来到 Mastodon.im！我们欢迎任何热情、友好、乐于分享的朋友们加入。请遵循互相尊重的原则，并遵守本站的《主题或发言规则》。 本站点基于开源软件长毛象（Mastodon）建立。不同于微博或 Twitter，这是一个开源的去中心化社交网络。去中心化设计防止社交数据被利益集团垄断，也增加了屏蔽审查的难度。整个长毛象网络由上千个实例组成，这些实例相互连接，最终形成了一个庞大的网络，就像是一个巨大宇宙。每一个服务器都是宇宙中的一个星系，用户就是每个星系里的行星。你可以随时导出自己的账户并转移到其他实例中，无需担心因为实例运营者的问题导致的数据丢失。 请参阅《长毛象中文用户使用文档》了解如何使用长毛象。

instance.title: Saronno.one
instance.shortDescription:
Mastodon è un social network non commerciale, federato e decentralizzato. Saronno One è una istanza italiana offerta e gestita dal quotidiano online IlSaronno.

Mastodon è una rete sociale federata. Ciò significa che nessuna singola entità controlla l'intera rete, piuttosto,come la posta elettronica, i volontari e le organizzazioni gestiscono i propri server indipendenti nei quali gli utenti possono interagire tra loro anche se registrati in server differenti. Saronno.one fa parte della federazione mastodon e rispetta i principi cardine dei social decentralizzati: indipendenti, etici, liberi, gratuiti e autogestiti dalla propria community.

Mastodon è costruito come una versione più etica di Twitter e al momento è il più grande social network decentralizzato.

Benvenuti in una federazione di social dove gli inserzionisti non sono i padroni di casa.

Dove i vostri dati non sono confezionati e venduti.

Dove siete voi, non gli algoritmi, a decidere cosa vedere.

Dove puoi segnalare direttamente agli admin i contenuti ingannevoli.

Dove le azioni tossiche vengono tenute fuori.

Dove ti piace davvero passare il tempo.

Benvenuti sui social come dovrebbero essere.

Benvenuti su saronno.one.

rules.text: No apologia del fascismo - nazismo

No a comportamenti molesti e tossici, dogpiling o doxxing.
No al razzismo, sessismo, misoginia, omofobia, bifobia, lesbofobia, transfobia, afobia
No alla diffusione intenzionale di notizie false, fuorvianti o manipolate e alla condivisione di informazioni con intenti antiscientifici.

rules.text: No se permitirán actitudes, violentas, amenazantes, abusivas, discriminatorias, que pongan en riesgo los derechos y deberes de las personas, que atenten contra la privacidad, o que justifiquen atrocidades.
Los usuarios de La Terracita podrán acordar actitudes no permitidas no contempladas en la lista anterior.

Las medidas a tomar en caso de infracción pueden ir desde el apercibimiento, la suspensión temporal, la suspensión permanente, la notificación a las instancias de origen, o el bloqueo a nivel de instancia llegado el caso.
La Terracita anuncia su compromiso con el covenant de Mastodon (https://joinmastodon.org/covenant) en todos sus puntos.

Es la intención de La Terracita de mantener unas buenas prácticas de moderación y transparencia siguiendo los Principios de Santa Clara (https://santaclaraprinciples.org/), en la medida de lo posible y adaptados a la naturaleza no-corporativa sin ánimo de lucro de La Terracita.
El contenido publicado en La Terracita deberá cumplir la legislación vigente española, incluyendo la RGPD.

Como en cualquier instancia de Mastodon, los mensajes privados no están protegidos por cifrado. Los administradores de La Terracita se comprometen a proteger la confidencialidad, integridad y disponibilidad de las conversaciones públicas y privadas, dentro del marco de la legislación vigente.
Sólo se proporcionará acceso al contenido o metadatos de conversaciones no públicas en presencia de una orden judicial.
La Terracita, a día de hoy, no ha recibido ningún requerimiento u orden judicial de ningún tipo.
La Terracita se reserva el derecho de modificar y/o desarrollar estas normas cuando sea necesario.

instance.title: Saptodon
instance.shortDescription:
saptodon is a Mastodon server for all SAP developers, consultants, architects and anyone interested in SAP technology.
This server is not SAP owned/operated

rules.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the saptodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email h.tammen@tammen-it-solutions.de

Toot in English, please. This makes moderation easier and it helps everyone on this server to follow the discussions. 
If you toot from your saptodon account to someone at another server in another language than english that's of course ok.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not “shitpost” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” on saptodon.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on saptodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Abide by the law. Very simple. You can also be reported on the internet.
If you want to create a NSFW-only account, you may want to consider another instance. We are probably not suitable for you.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or the promotion of the ideology of National Socialism.

Recruiter? This is probably not your space If you are a recruiter or work for recruiter this may not be your mastodon instance. If you place project requests here we will suspend your account. You can of course discuss SAP issues with us.

rules.text: Don't be a dick. If you screw up and get called out on it, apologize and move on, and try to learn from it. This one is vague, but as the Supreme Court said, "I know it when I see it." Similarly, try not to take deep offense easily. Reasonable people can disagree without violating this rule.
No spam or advertising. You may promote yourself and causes you care about, but keep it reasonable.

Please make use of content warnings (CW's) where appropriate. Things that should definitely get CWs (but not limited to): violence, trauma, imagery associated with those. Things you can CW (but shouldn't feel pressured to): politics, media, sports?
Absolutely no: bigotry; racism; misogyny; xenophobia; discrimination on the basis of race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, gender, sexual preferences, body type.  (See Rule 1)
No advocacy of violence or inciting violence, including harassment. This one will get you banned quickly.
No commercial bots, follow bots, or any bots that annoy the admins of this instance. If you want to point a bot at us, please make it useful or something that elevates discourse.
No stalking or harassment.

Represent Austin well when interacting with the rest of the fediverse. If we get legitimate complaints about a user here from another admin, we will most likely take action to avoid being defederated.

rules.text: No trolling, microaggressions, bullying, doxxing, or harassment.
Respect others' boundaries.

Use the Content Warning feature liberally.  Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics.  If you have to ask yourself, err on the side of requiring an extra click.
Posting the same content on multiple instances in order to spam local and/or federated timelines is not permitted.
No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (including illustrations).
No content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism.  No conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions is disallowed and will result in a permanent ban.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia, casteism, and/or violent nationalism or the advocacy of any of the above.
No unapproved advertising or spam.
Bots must be approved by the administrators and are subject to all rules above.
Provably false content is subject to removal by the administrators.  Repeated posting of disinformation or intentional misinformation will result in a permanent ban.
In plain English: Be excellent to each other.  Don't be Nazis.  Respect boundaries.

instance.title: discourse.social
instance.shortDescription: a Mastodon instance for pro-democracy, pro-science voices, established by illumineX on November 7, 2022.
instance.description: Discourse.social is a Mastodon instance for pro-democracy, pro-science voices. We founded Discourse.social because we believe that social media may have accidentally become an essential part of the global discourse for democracy. That global conversation probably won't be happening on Twitter, the platform on which it first emerged, for very much longer. Still, the conversation and the social graph that makes it possible has become vital. If you agree, please feel free to join us. If you would like to create a profile here, send email to me at: moose@discourse.social and include a link to your blog, Twitter profile or other social media presence, to help us see who you are. It helps us determine that you're not an imposter if you set up a profile at illumineX maker of EyeSpy, the cartoon eyes toy for Mac. We also make scalable mobile app and cloud systems for enterprise, government, and venture-capital-funded startup companies.

Personal/political attacks inclusive of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia.
Publishing others’ private information.
Publish any illegal content in the UK.
Incitement of violence/violent ideologies

Company accounts are welcome but advertising is not permitted on this server. Over promotion, bot like behaviour replying to users, etc. will not be tolerated.

Have a link to the IoW and state how in the signup process.

rules.text: Cette instance est réservée aux communautés universitaires et de recherche en informatique.
Votre identifiant doit comporter le nom sous lequel vous êtes couramment connu.
Nous vous recommandons de faire vérifier votre page web sur votre profil (rel="me"). La démarche est expliquée dans la section métadonnées de la page modifier votre profil.

Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
Les contenus violents ne sont pas les bienvenus et sont de toutes façon à protéger d'un CW (content warning, contenu sensible). Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdites toutes conduites, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.

rules.text: We support self-identification/diagnosis as these are often inaccessible due to cost, biases and other factors. Questioning folks are welcome.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, able-ism, etc. will be tolerated.
No impersonating other people.
No harassment of any kind.

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand).
No advertisements for cryptocurrencies, NFT's, or multi-level marketing schemes.
We strongly discourage posting un-described images or video on Public privacy setting.
No cross-post only accounts from Twitter, RSS on Public privacy setting.
No serious dishonesty that is hurtful to others.
No promotion or support of treatments which aim to suppress characteristics of individual identity (ABA, Conversion Therapy) is permitted on this server.

rules.text: IMPORTANTE: Las cuentas que no cumplan mayoritariamente con la temática de la instancia podrían ser y serán suspendidas. Si no vas a cumplir la temática y normas de la instancia, NO te registres aquí.
La pornografia infantil, incitación a la violencia o promoción de ideologias violentas, está prohibida.
Prohibido el contenido ilegal bajo las leyes españolas.
Cada usuario es dueño de sus comentarios. Esta instancia de Mastodon, no se responsabiliza de los comentarios de sus usuarios.
No cuentas centradas en activismo reivindicativo ni en la política institucional.

Esta instancia no acepta ningún tipo de comportamiento que atente contra la dignidad de las personas, por su raza, sexo, orientación sexual, identidad de género, situación personal o riesgo de exclusión social.
Por favor, evita publicar bulos intencionadamente.

El contenido para adultos (desnudos, pornografía, violencia o gore) está restringido a creaciones artísticas (FanArts, ilustraciones, dibujos...) siempre que coincida con la temática de la instancia y debe incluir siempre etiqueta CW. Las cuentas de autopromoción para adultos están prohibidas.

We follow the Mastodon Server Covenant (https://joinmastodon.org/covenant)
